name: We All Die
description:
DOWNLOAD OR PLAY ON FIREFOX!CHROME/CHROMIUM GLITCHES!

Full Screen Recommended!

The beings of your planet live on the edge. Asteroids are constantly attempting to end life as they know it. Your job is to operate the lasers in order to buy your creatures time to enjoy life, even though they all know it will all inevitably end...

Tools Used:

  • Godot
  • Aseprite
  • Ableton
  • sfxr
  • Pixel FX Designer
